broad_search.title: Broad search
broad_search.msg: Your search criterias may lead into a broad search, which may consume a lot of API credits and freeze your browser.

help.origin: A list of origin airports. Comma-delimited if multiple, such as 'SFO,LAX'
help.destination: A list of origin airports. Comma-delimited if multiple, such as 'FRA,LHR'

api_key_warning.title: Missing Seats.aero API Key
api_key_warning.msg: Before using this tool you need to configure your Seats.aero API key, located in the menu of this website. You can get your Seats.aero API key
